description: Commercial occasional and lounge range of soft seating, ideal for any venue or purpose offering outstanding value for money. Combine our soft seating and dining chairs with any of our coffee tables for a complete furnishing solution. Available in a wide range of fabrics and finishes. These items are available in your choice of fabrics, fauxs, and leathers as they are bespoke. Don't see anything you like? Give us a ring with your requirements and we'll be happy to help! All items which contain foam and/or fabric are CRIB 5 Certified unless otherwise stated.
name: Side & Occasional Soft Seating
